turkish_example_sentence: Ben o ilginç hikayeyi duymuşsam, sana anlatırdım.
english_example_sentence: If I had heard that interesting story, I would have told you.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я услышал ту интересную историю, я бы тебе рассказал.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben o ilginç hikayeyi ______, sana anlatırdım.
